messages.subject: Simple Shinsengumi Kanji Wallpaper / Sec's Aizu in California
messages.msgSnippet: Found this on the net. For those of you who like white desktop backgrounds and would like simple kanji... Go to this website:
messages.messageBody:
Found this on the net. For those of you who like white desktop
backgrounds and would like simple kanji... Go to this website:
http://www.dodesho.com/kanji/index8.html

Sec sent me a project she's been working on for a while, Aizu in
California. She asked me to host it so here's the link :
http://www.streamload.com/green_2

password is miburo
